txt.en: 'Oh! Before you go, I have one last favour to ask of you.\n\n'The Durub Orcs worship Sauron. If you can burn their shrines while you are lopping off their heads, you will be cleansing Moria of unwholesome tributes.'
'Thank you, [placeholder]! You are a great boon to the dwarves.'
'The Durub and the Orcs of Moria will soon be at each other's throats!'
Dómárr has asked you to burn shrines in the Durub Orc camp in the Great Hall of Durin.
The Durub shrine is in the camp of Gazatu-ru, south of the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nDómárr has asked you to burn shrines in Gazatu-ru Durub Orc-camp.
Dómárr is at his encampment in the Great Hall of Durin.\n\nYou should return to Dómárr.
